name: Night Runner (Holly Thompson)
description:
Night Runner is a side-scrolling runner inspired by red riding hood. The player must try and reach the end of the forest to escape from the wolf whilst collecting flowers along the way to maintain their sanity and avoid obstacles.

Credits:

Artist: James De Bock, Michael Kirby, Ethan Snelleksz, Holly Thompson, Caleb Draper 

Designers: Leo Lopez, Matthew Wakely, Oskar Sandon, Daniel Bobbi 

Programmers: George Lamb, Ryan Snelleksz
